Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis Bs11 (MIC=0.7 µM), Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1 (MIC=2 µM), Streptococcus pyogenes (MIC=1 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=0.5 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC=1 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Shortened cecropin A-melittin hybrids. Significant size reduction retains potent antibiotic activity.
